codelist.title: MARC Code List for Languages
codelist.author: Network Development and MARC Standards Office, Library of Congress

note.text: Use for the other languages of Central America and Mexico, as well as forthelanguages of the Azteco-Tanoan language phylum.
Use for related Japanese languages and dialects
Use for related Korean languages and dialects
Use for the other languages of North America north of Mexico excludingthelanguages of the Azteco-Tanoan language phylum.
